Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to research and misrepresentation of and restricting advertisement and promotion of electronic cigarettes
Summary: Relates to research and misrepresentation of and restricting advertisement and promotion of electronic cigarettes.
LawCode: Add Art 24-D ยง375, Gen Bus L; add ยง1399-bb-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to research and misrepresentations of electronic cigarettes; and to amend the public health law, in relation to restricting certain advertisement and promotion of electronic cigarettes
